item.title: WWDC Group Session Notes
item.author: abilash@zeyrie.dev (Abilash S)
item.description:
At this year’s WWDC, Apple released a major change to the design system: Liquid Glass.

SwiftUI Session
#

Notes from the group session regarding SwiftUI:

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.author: abilash@zeyrie.dev (Abilash S)
item.description: This website uses Umami to capture anonymized metrics about the page views it receives. Umami is an open-source, privacy-focused analytics service which strives to provide helpful metrics without capturing any personally-identifiable information about visitors. Umami Analytics is hosted in a private server, hence it is not available to any corporations or third-party actors.

item.title: Under Maintenance
item.author: abilash@zeyrie.dev (Abilash S)
item.description: Currently working on some improvements, until then look around. Maybe visit my feeds to learn something interesting about my work.

item.title: About Me
item.author: abilash@zeyrie.dev (Abilash S)
item.description:
From college graduate to iOS developer, with a few detours through Arch Linux ricing and terminal wizardry along the way.

The Professional Path

Hey there! I’m Abilash, and like many developers, my journey into tech wasn’t exactly a straight line. iOS development became my first professional gig right out of college â€” talk about jumping into the deep end!
